subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Amy Yang of South Korea won the title in Annika Sorenstam’s finale on home turf, tying the course record with a nine-under 63 for a six-shot victory at the Scandinavian TPC in Stockholm.
snippet: Amy Yang of South Korea won the title in Annika Sorenstam’s finale on home turf, tying the course record with a nine-under 63 for a six-shot victory at the Scandinavian TPC in Stockholm.
